title: The ground coverage of the Exhibition-cum-Convention Centre on such plot shall not exceed 2/ 3rd of the gross plot area excluding Development Plan proposals of reservation and/ or roads, if any
clause_text: The ground coverage of the Exhibition-cum-Convention Centre on such plot shall not exceed 2/ 3rd of the gross plot area excluding Development Plan proposals of reservation and/ or roads, if any. LOS and Amenity Area shall be provided on such plot as prescribed in Regulation 27.
section: 33 (22) Regulation for Exhibition-cum-Convention Centers in MCGM Area

source_pdf.text_snippet: The ground coverage of the Exhibition-cum-Convention Centre on such plot shall not exceed 2/ 3rd of the gross plot area excluding Development Plan proposals of reservation and/ or roads, if any.
